subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer eased to victory over Mikhail Kukushkin, 6-4, 6-4, 6-2, on Friday, bringing host Switzerland level at 1-1 with Kazakhstan in the Davis Cup quarterfinals.
snippet: Roger Federer eased to victory over Mikhail Kukushkin, 6-4, 6-4, 6-2, on Friday, bringing host Switzerland level at 1-1 with Kazakhstan in the Davis Cup quarterfinals.
